scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes to inflict damage.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames that may also leave the target with a burn.

flame_burst.name: Flame Burst
flame_burst.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame that damages nearby allies.

water_gun.name: Water Gun
water_gun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

bubble_beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble_beam.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.

hydro_pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro_pump.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.
